lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The shift towards securitisation has been helped by volatile financial markets which have developed hedging facilities such as floating rate notes and bonds for risk management, said Overseas Union General Manager Loh Hoon Sun.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Loh said the Stock Exchange of Singapore might expand equity issues by as much as one billion dlrs this year because of the increasing ability of foreign and local market participants to absorb new issues.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Singapore's major banks are diversifying and gradually shifting their asset holdings from loans to debt instruments, banking sources said.
